revised_title: Crystal Field and Hyperfine Interactions of Lanthanide Ions in Metallic Gold
tldr: This article explores the crystal field and hyperfine interactions of lanthanide ions in metallic gold. The authors derive algebraic formulae for the energy levels of the ground states of lanthanide ions in a cubic crystalline field and discuss the hyperfine interactions of various ions. They also suggest possible experiments involving magnetic and acoustic resonance and some applications to cryogenics.
